```{r setup,echo=F,message=F,warning=F}
# Libraries
library(tidyverse)
library(htmltools)
library(googlesheets)

# Publications
journals <- c("Journal of Personality and Social Psychology",
              "Self and Identity",
              "Psychological Science",
              "Evolutionary Behavioral Sciences",
              "Developmental Psychology",
              "Attachment and Human Development")

# Get pubs gsheet
gs_auth()
pubs <- gs_read(gs_title("pubs")) %>% 
  mutate(
    citation = str_replace(citation,"Young, E. S.","<b>Young, E. S.</b>"),
    citation = case_when(str_detect(citation, journals[1]) ~ str_replace(citation,journals[1],paste0("<em>",journals[1],"</em>")),
                         str_detect(citation, journals[2]) ~ str_replace(citation,journals[2],paste0("<em>",journals[2],"</em>")),
                         str_detect(citation, journals[3]) ~ str_replace(citation,journals[3],paste0("<em>",journals[3],"</em>")),
                         str_detect(citation, journals[4]) ~ str_replace(citation,journals[4],paste0("<em>",journals[4],"</em>")),
                         str_detect(citation, journals[5]) ~ str_replace(citation,journals[5],paste0("<em>",journals[5],"</em>")),
                         str_detect(citation, journals[6]) ~ str_replace(citation,journals[6],paste0("<em>",journals[6],"</em>")),
                         TRUE~citation)
  )

# Journal articles
articles <- pubs %>% 
  filter(pub_type=="journal") %>% 
  arrange(desc(year)) %>% 
  mutate(count      = 1:n()) %>% 
  arrange(desc(year)) %>% 
  group_by(year) %>%
  mutate(count_year = 1:n(),
         count_auth = ifelse(str_detect(citation,"^<b>Young, E. S."), count*-1, count_year),
         border     = ifelse(count_year == max(count_auth),"solid","none"),
         year_group = ifelse(count_auth == min(count_auth),year,"") %>% str_replace("-"," ")) %>% 
  arrange(desc(year),count_auth) %>% 
  ungroup() %>% 
  mutate(
    border   = ifelse(count == last(count),"",border),
    download = ifelse(is.na(download),"", 
                      paste0("<a class = 'label success', role = 'button', href =", download, " download =", download, ">Download</a>")),
    abstract = ifelse(is.na(abstract),"", 
                      paste0("<a class = 'label focus collapse-toggle'",
                             "href = '#abstract-",year,"-",count,"' ",
                             "role = 'button'>Abstract<span class = 'caret down'></span></a> ",
                             ifelse(is.na(download)," ",download),
                             "<div id = 'abstract","-",year,"-",count,"' ",
                             "class = 'collapse-box hide bg-aluminum', ",
                             "style = 'margin: 0; padding: 25px;'>",
                             "<p class = 'small'><em>", abstract, "</em></p></div>",
                             "</div>"))
  ) 

# Chapters
chapters <- pubs %>% 
  filter(pub_type=="chapter") %>% 
  arrange(desc(year)) %>% 
  mutate(count = 1:n()) %>% 
  group_by(year) %>%
  mutate(count      = 1:n()) %>% 
  arrange(desc(year)) %>% 
  group_by(year) %>%
  mutate(count_year = 1:n(),
         count_auth = ifelse(str_detect(citation,"^<b>Young, E. S."), count*-1, count_year),
         border     = ifelse(count_year == max(count_auth),"solid","none"),
         year_group = ifelse(count_auth == min(count_auth),year,"") %>% str_replace("-"," ")) %>% 
  arrange(desc(year),count_auth) %>% 
  ungroup() %>% 
  mutate(
    border   = ifelse(count == last(count),"",border),
    download = ifelse(is.na(download),"", 
                      paste0("<a class = 'label success', role = 'button', href =", download, " download =", download, ">Download</a>")),
    abstract = ifelse(is.na(abstract),"", 
                      paste0("<a class = 'label focus collapse-toggle'",
                             "href = '#abstract-",year,"-",count,"' ",
                             "role = 'button'>Abstract<span class = 'caret down'></span></a> ",
                             ifelse(is.na(download)," ",download),
                             "<div id = 'abstract","-",year,"-",count,"' ",
                             "class = 'collapse-box hide bg-aluminum', ",
                             "style = 'margin: 0; padding: 25px;'>",
                             "<p class = 'small'><em>", abstract, "</em></p></div>",
                             "</div>"))
  ) 
```

### Publications

```{r peer_reviewed,echo=F,message=F,warning=F}
tags$fieldset(
  tags$legend(style = "font-size: 16px;","Peer Reviewed Articles"),
  tags$table(style = "margin: 0;",
             tags$tbody(
               tags$table(
                 HTML(
                   articles %>% 
                     filter(pub_type=="journal") %>% 
                     str_glue_data(
                       "<tr >",
                       "<tr >",
                       "<td style = '",
                       "border-style: none none {border} none;",
                       "border-width: 1px 1px 1px 1px;",
                       "border-color: rgba(0,0,0,.05);'>",
                       "<b>{year_group}</b>",
                       "</td>",
                       "<td style = '",
                       "border-style: none none {border} none;",
                       "border-width: 1px 1px 1px 1px;",
                       "border-color: rgba(0,0,0,.05);'>",
                       "<ul><li>{citation}</li>",
                       "<div data-component = 'collapse'>",
                       "{abstract}",
                       "</div>",
                       "</ul>",
                       "</td>",
                       "</tr>"
                     ) %>% 
                     paste(collapse = "")
                 )
               )
             )
  )
)
```
